org.middleheaven.core.services
Class ServiceActivator

java.lang.Object
  org.middleheaven.core.services.ServiceActivator
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractUIServiceActivator, AccessControlActivator, AlarmClockScheduleWorkExecutionServiceActivator, AutoCommitTransactionServiceActivator, DataServiceActivator, DataSourceServiceActivator, DomainStoreServiceActivator, FileRepositoryActivator, FileSequenceStorageActivator, HttpClientServiceActivator, ImageServiceActivator, JavaMailActivator, JDBCDataBaseServiceActivator, JNDINamingDirectoryActivator, LicenseServiceActivator, LogKeepingActivator, LuceneTextSearchServiceActivator, NotificationServiceActivator, StandardApplicationScannerServiceActivator, StandardApplicationServiceActivator
public abstract class ServiceActivator
extends java.lang.Object

Parent class of all service activators. An activator must have a no arguments constructor and implement the methods in this class. An activator should procure required services and publish its own services to the ServiceContext.
